text: Ni nganitutumisyeje ntenga jwalijose ikaaweje kuti akundidweje kwa lisosa lya Allah. Sano wanganyao pandema jawalitendele lupuso achimisyene, ingawe wam’bichilile (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) ni kum'benda Allah chikululuko, nombe najo Ntenga ﷺ nikwawendela chikululuko, chisimu chene angansimene Allah ali Jwakupochela nnope toba, Jwachanasa channope
